data.text:
@SCP_Hughes Montreal has a Gurdwara right in the middle of a dystopian commercial-industrial strip.
 https://t.co/iIKW167Y7z #googleearth

Makes me hopeful every time I drive near.

The purpose of religious architecture is to make people believe.

Let us not forget either some spectacular contributions that Indian architectural traditions have made to Britain's modern heritage. 
https://t.co/OLHxAOcy2I

@HCI_London I am indeed humbly fascinated by Indian architecture and urbanism, whose richness and diversity are unsurpassed and perhaps unequalled. I am supposed to visit in November after two years of postponement, and I am sure my photographs will fill this account for months thereafter. https://t.co/PRhyPiipSB
